column4: chaps, does anyone know of an ubuntu iso that will fit onto a spare 512mb usb stick that i have lying around ?
are you installing to or from the stick?
I'm installing to the stick, so i have a portable linux boot stick if i go over to a friends house for instance
you could install ubuntu minimal to it then build up, it's going to be a tight sqeeze, don't expect compiz to run and definately do not attempt to install openoffice
perfect thanks, will do that - my other stick came in very handy for virus scanning and fixing friends borked puters
i suggest you use openbox or flwm to get a desktop
